title: The Balloon tree
creator_credit: PGL Productions, Ross Lowell, Edward Nielsen and Tibor Sands
brief_description: The plot revolves around a boy’s visit to his aunt’s house in New York City and the sights and sounds he encounters in a series of adventures in the streets and parks. Without commentary, the film is noted for its soft-colour photography and controlled visuals. Cameraman: Edward Nielsen. Suitable for secondary years 7-12.
